verses.content: Aw ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk la, Ka sûnga um po pohai, a hming inthieng chu inpâk ro.
Aw ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk la, A thilthaw ṭhat po po chu theinghil naw.
Ama chun i rîtlona po po a ngaidam hlak a, I natna po po a sukdam hlak.
Bohmangnaa inthawkin i hringna chu ân tlan hlak a, Zainêmna le lainatnahai ân khumtir hlak cheh a.
I bau chu thil ṭhain a sukkhawp hlak a; chuongchun, i tleirâwlna chu mupui anga siemtharin a um nâwk hlak.
LALPA chun nêksâwrna tuorhai po po ta dingin, Thil felhai thawpêkin, rohai a rêlpêk hlak.
A lampuihai chu Mosie ân hriettir a, A thil thawhai chu Israel thlahai ân hriettir bawk a.
LALPA chu lainatnaa sip, mi lunginsiet theitak, Lunginuoitak, ngilneina hautak a nih.
Ama chun hal rawp naw ni a, A lungsen chu vawng kumkhuo naw ni.
Ei suolnahai angin ei chungah a thaw nawh a, Ei rîtlona angin a mi thung bawk nawh.
Vân khi hnuoi chung insângtaka a um angin, Ama ṭituhai chungah a ngilneina chu a nasa a nih.
Sak le thlang ân hlat angin, Ei bawsietnahai chu ei kuoma inthawkin a sie hmang dai tah a.
Pain a nauhai a lunginsiet ang hin, LALPA chun ama ṭituhai chu a lunginsiet hlak.
Ei taksa siem dân hi a hriet a, Pilvut el ei nih ti a hriet zing leiin.
Mihriem chu, a dam sûng nihai chu hlobet ang a na, Phûl pâr ang hin a vul hlak a.
Thliin a mût a, a bo hlak a nih, A umna chun hre nâwk ta naw nih.
LALPA zainêmna ruok chu a ṭituhai chunga chun chatuona inthawka chatuon chenin um a ta, A felna khawm an thlahai thlahai chenin;
A thuthlung zâwm taphawt le, A thuhrilhai awi tuma hre zinghai taphawt chunga chun.
LALPA chun a lalṭhungpha chu vâna khin a sukdet a, A ram chun iengkim chungah ro a rêl a.
A vântirkohai, a thu ngaia, a thu zâwma, hrâtnaa ropui hlakhai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.
A sipaihai, LALPA chu inpâk ro, A dit zâwng thawh a, a rawng bâwltuhai,
A rorêlna hmun po poa a thilthaw po pohai, LALPA chu inpâk ro: Aw Ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk rawh.
